meanings.definition: A person who is a fan of the theater.
meanings.sent1: The stageheads eagerly awaited the opening night of the play.
meanings.sent2: Many stageheads enjoy discussing their favorite actors and shows.
meanings.sent3: The stageheads couldn't contain their excitement when meeting the lead actor.
meanings.sent4: To the stageheads, the theater was a magical realm where dreams came to life.
meanings.sent5: The stageheads' passion for the arts was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The front part of a stage.
meanings.sent1: The performers stood at the stageheads, ready to begin the show.
meanings.sent2: The stagehands adjusted the props at the stageheads before the performance.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat wandered onto the stageheads during the play.
meanings.sent4: The spotlight shone brightly on the stageheads, highlighting the action.
meanings.sent5: The stageheads provided the perfect platform for the actors to showcase their talent.
